start.text: Does the unit have a condensate pump WITH a float switch hooked up?

verify_float.text: Does the float switch have continuity through it when lowered? You want ZERO ohms, not infinite ohms.

stat_wire_colors.text: Do all the wire colors match at the thermostat and at the indoor unit? (eg. Red > R, Blue > Y on both)

color_correct.text: Correct so all colors match their respective terminals.

cooling_set.text: Is the thermostat set for cooling?

set_cooling.text: Set thermostat to cooling; make setpoint five degrees below room temp.

time_delay.text: Is the time delay satisfied? Select 'Yes' if there is no time delay.

time_wait.text: Wait for the time delay to satisfy. Usually indicated by a blinking light to go solid.

24vac_trans.text: Is there 24vac leg to leg at the transformer?

line_volt.text: Is there correct line voltage coming into the transformer?

fan_call.text: Is there 24vac between G and C at the ASK MIKE

fan_power.text: Is there correct line voltage at the fan?

fan_control.text: Verify correct operation of the fan relay and/or circuit board, depending on what controls the fan. Replace as needed.

heat_pump.text: Is the system a heat pump?

cool_call.text: Is there 24vac between Y and C at ASK MIKE?

verify_connections.text: Verify all stat wire connections. If connections are good, verify 24vac between Y and C at the thermostat. If not present, replace the thermostat.

cond_yc.text: Are the correct wires landed on Y and C at the condenser? (ASK MIKE)

cond_wires.text: Land the correct wires on Y and C at the condenser.

contactor_coil.text: Is there 24vac across the condenser's contactor's COIL side, leg to leg?

verify_wires.text: Verify all connections and wire nuts. If connections and nuts are good, there is likely a break in the wire from the unit. Identify and replace the wire.

cap_check.text: Check the capacitor, replace if necessary.

heat_when_cooling.text: Is the system heating when it should be cooling?

reversing_valve.text: Is there 24vac leg to leg at the reversing valve?

rev_cool_1.text: Is there supposed to be 24vac for cooling operations? This MUST be verified with the manufacturer.

stat_heat_pump.text: Change the programming of the thermostat for correct heat pump operations.

rev_cool_2.text: Is there supposed to be 24vac for cooling operations? This MUST be verified with the manufacturer. ASK MIKE

cob.text: Is there 24vac between C and O/B?

verify_stat_program.text: Verify the programming of the thermostat and replace if necessary.

cob_out.text: Is there 24vac at condenser between C and O/B wires?

verify_cob_con.text: Verify all connections. If connections are all good, replace stat wire to the condenser.

ambient_temp.text: Is the ambient temperature above the unit's designed running temp?

too_cold.text: It is too cold for the A/C to run. System is being held out by the outdoor sensor.

continue_diagnostics.text: Continue diagnostics using factory wiring diagram for troubleshooting. Pay special attention to a defrost board failing and holding out cooling functions (if a defrost board is present).
